name: roboliq-software
description: Roboliq Software System for automating liquid handling robots

scripts.compile: cd roboliq-processor && npm run compile && cd ../roboliq-evoware && npm run compile
scripts.test: cd roboliq-processor && npm test && cd ../roboliq-evoware && npm test
scripts.docs: cd roboliq-processor && npm run jsdoc && cd ../roboliq-evoware && npm run jsdoc && cd ../api-generator && npm start

author: Ellis Whitehead
